common.noHiddenFees: No hidden fees • Cancel anytime • 100% Transparent

services.subtitle: End-to-end automotive solutions all managed through Motor X Logistic Cloud

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Auto Business?
cta.subtitle: Join 1000+ dealers who trust Motor X for their automotive needs

subscription.title: Auction Subscription
subscription.subtitle: YOUR OWN BIDDER ACCOUNTS
subscription.description: Get access to major U.S. auto auctions through our account, with lower fees, access to closed states (Michigan, Wisconsin and Alabama), and full support for you and your bidders.
subscription.footer: No hidden fees * cancel anytime * 100% transparent

dispatch.title: Dispatch
dispatch.subtitle: VEHICLE TRANSPORTATION SERVICES
dispatch.description: We coordinate fast and reliable vehicle pickup from auctions or dealers and deliver directly to our trusted shipping partners or the shipper of your preference for export.

shipping.title: International Shipping
shipping.subtitle: OCEAN CONTAINER SHIPPING
shipping.description: Secure container shipping with professional loading, consolidation, and full coordination to ensure your vehicles arrive safely and efficiently at their destination.
shipping.footer: Secure Container Loading * Export Documentation Support * Safe & Reliable Transport

titles.title: Title Services
titles.subtitle: DOCUMENTATION SOLUTIONS
titles.description: We provide solutions for problematic or missing vehicle documents, helping resolve title issues so your vehicles can be exported without delays.
titles.footer: Bill of Sale Only * Lien Release * Impossible Duplicates

dismantling.title: Dismantling Services
dismantling.subtitle: CUT HALF CARS
dismantling.description: We professionally dismantle vehicles and cut units per your request and in compliance with export regulations, preparing them safely and efficiently for international shipping.
dismantling.footer: Half-Cut for Shipping * Cost-Efficient Solutions * Professional Dismantling

consultation.title: Consultation and Financial Services
consultation.subtitle: Expert Guidance & Financing
consultation.description: Expert guidance and flexible financial solutions to help you purchase, manage, and ship vehicles with confidence and efficiency, to avoid costly mistakes.
consultation.footer: Payment Solutions * Holiday Delays * Buyer Guidance

singleBidPage.title: Single Bid Service
singleBidPage.subtitle: One-time access to major auctions without a subscription.

steps.title: How Single Bid Works
steps.step1: Select your vehicle from any supported auction.
steps.step2: Place your single bid securely through our platform.
steps.step3: We handle the bidding and transaction if you win.
